Houston.Brazos River Bottom:
Brazos River Bottom, also known as the BRB, was a gay bar located in the Montrose neighborhood of Houston, Texas, United States, that opened in 1978. At the time of its closure in 2013, it was one of Houston's oldest gay bars, and the oldest still running at its original location.


== Description ==
Brazos River Bottom hosted a unique cowboy atmosphere, drawing on Houston's Old Western history.
